member.name: T:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.Repository`1
member.summary: Generic repository with basic operations.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.Repository`1.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new Repository.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.Repository`1.#ctor(System.Data.Entity.DbContext)
member.summary: Creates a new Repository.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.Repository`1.Find(System.Object[])
member.summary: Finds an entity with the given primary key values. If no entity is found, then null is returned.
member.param: The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.Repository`1.Insert(`0)
member.summary: Inserts a new entity into the repository.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.Repository`1.Update(`0)
member.summary: Updates an existing entity in the repository.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.Repository`1.Delete(System.Object[])
member.summary: Removes an entity from the respository.
member.param: The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.
member.returns: False if the entity does not exist in the repository, or true if successfully deleted.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.Repository`1.FindAsync(System.Object[])
member.summary: Finds an entity with the given primary key values. If no entity is found, then null is returned.
member.param: The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous find operation. The task result contains the entity found, or null.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.Repository`1.FindAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Object[])
member.summary: Finds an entity with the given primary key values. If no entity is found, then null is returned.
member.param: A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.
The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous find operation. The task result contains the entity found, or null.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.Repository`1.DeleteAsync(System.Object[])
member.summary: Removes an entity from the respository.
member.param: The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous delete operation. The task result will be false if the entity does not exist in the repository, or true if successfully removed.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.Repository`1.DeleteAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Object[])
member.summary: Removes an entity from the respository.
member.param: A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.
The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous delete operation. The task result will be false if the entity does not exist in the repository, or true if successfully removed.

member.name: P:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.Repository`1.Context
member.summary: Gets and sets the DbContext for the repository.

member.name: P:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.Repository`1.Set
member.summary: Gets the DbSet for the respository

member.name: T:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.UnitOfWork
member.summary: General unit of work for committing changes across one or more repositories. Inherit from this class to supply a specific DbContext. Add a property for each respository for which unit of work must be done.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.UnitOfWork.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new general unit of work.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.UnitOfWork.#ctor(System.Data.Entity.DbContext)
member.summary: Constructs a new general unit of work.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.UnitOfWork.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the DbContext.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.UnitOfWork.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes the DbContext.
member.param: True to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.UnitOfWork.SaveChanges
member.summary: Saves changes made to one or more repositories.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.UnitOfWork.SaveChangesAsync
member.summary: Saves changes made to one or more repositories.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous save operation. The task result contains the number of objects saved.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.UnitOfWork.SaveChangesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Saves changes made to one or more repositories.
member.param: A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous save operation. The task result contains the number of objects saved.

member.name: P:TrackableEntities.Patterns.EF6.UnitOfWork.Context
member.summary: Gets the DbContext for the unit of work.
